titleStmt.title: Christianity in short or The way to be a good Christian· Recommended to the use of such as want either time or capacity for reading longer and learneder discourses. By C. Ellis author of the Gentile-sinner.
titleStmt.author: Ellis, Clement, 1630-1700.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Tho. Guy, at the Oxford Armes, on the west side of the Royal Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.
